channel.title: The most annoying bug
channel.description: I am using Allstars source but I am sure the whole moparscape community knows that now lol. Anyways when I add ints to additional items and custom there is an extra line above the "take" item in the game when the item has been dropped. It just says [b]..[/b] and then [b]take[/b] under that and then examine etc... how do I fix this glitch. It is so annoying.

item.title: The most annoying bug
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I am using Allstars source but I am sure the whole moparscape community knows that now lol. Anyways when I add ints to additional items and custom there is an extra line above the “take” item in the game when the item has been dropped. It just says … and then take under that and then examine etc… how do I fix this glitch. It is so annoying.

Read full topic
